attributes.action: The dismissal of Mark Field, UK foreign minister
attributes.background: Mark Field has defended the barbaric actions of the Sultan of Brunei and his enforcement of the law then sentences gay men to death by stoning. Upon discussing the matter, Field focused more on the monetary benefits of keeping a relationship with Brunei rather than the mortality of the situation.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/251142
